title: Couldn't compile test programs which import fmt package
body:
by **sven.sternberger**: 
Before filing a bug, please check whether it has been fixed since
the latest release: run "hg pull -u" and retry what you did to
reproduce the problem.  Thanks.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. get the actual release (11. sep)
2. compile test/index.go
3.

What is the expected output?
index.8

What do you see instead?
~/go/hg/test$ 8g index.go 
index.go:18: syntax error: unexpected :, expecting }


What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?
GOARCH=386
GOOS=linux


Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
92fcf05736e8 release.2010-09-06/release


Please provide any additional information below.
OS: Ubuntu 10.04 i386

It seems that all programs which include fmt are affected, I
rebuild several times the go compiler
